text: 5.10: Zo 3.33; 5.38; Ro 8.16; Ga 4.6Guma guigira Fhe Bakɨme Kama khothɨgi, ana Fhe Bakɨme suaŋgi buneŋ, ana ne ndigi, ne ana ndava vhen ki. Guma Fhe Bakɨme nzuai buneŋ khothɨgi fhu, mba guma ana khaŋ Fhe Bakɨme nzuai, ana bigi guiguigi guma ma. Ana maaŋ nzuav, ana Fhe Bakɨme won Kama bun nzuaim, ana ana khothɨgi fhu.
